subject: SHOWBIZ TONIGHT ALERT: Virginia Tech Shootings
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT - CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/PT

Today's shocking shootings at Virginia Tech University, the
deadliest campus shooting ever --- Tonight, the startling
video, first sent in by citizen journalists. How the
gripping
story played out on TV as a stunned nation
watched! Plus,
Showbiz Tonight asks: Does all the fake
violence we watch on TV
make us terribly desensitized or
have we been jolted back to
reality? A Showbiz Tonight
Special Report...

WATCH SHOWBIZ TONIGHT NIGHTS DAYS A
WEEK ON CNN HEADLINE PRIME
11pm ET/PT
